author: paulsp
msg: Set id attribute on Portlet and Entry element in PSML.

author: sgala
msg: Change the mechanism to have jlink in the toolbox. Instead of instantiating a new one for each request, leave the work to turbine, and setPortlet() of the right one in the rendering code. This deprecates the whole PortletTemplateLink class (I should have removed it, but...) as now JetspeedTemplateLink is able to deliver context sensitive links for Panes. I hope I won't break anything.

author: kimptoc
msg: moved the bin/classes creation into the init task - as the apis task now relies on it

author: sgala
msg: Avoid erasing package.html files in Castor apis when rebuilding or cleaning.
Also, compile Castor apis always with deprecation off (it uses SAX1 apis, which gives hundreds

author: kimptoc
